column4: i cant connect to the internet after a fresh install i can connect to local computers tho any suggestions why?
how you connecting? via gateway router?
yes
static ip's on a router
hmmz, what happens when you try to ping google.com?
i get a replie
hmm, are you able to resolve hosts? i wont had a similar problem except i had problems resolving hosts.
try "host nullnetwork.net" for kicks and tell me if it works
yes that is the problem i cant resolve any hosts!
how did you fix that?
gotcha! now what router are you using?
its an actiontec
it runs busybox

ok ive never heard of that, however this is what is happening, basically you're linux box is defaulting to always using your router as the nameserver (at your routers request) so effectively linux is overwriting resolv.conf all the time
i came up with 2 solutions.
1 was to use cron to enforce resolv.conf (hackish)
use an outside dns server?
second was i bought a new router, but in theory if you could find the setting on the router, you could disable it
exactly
thanks ;]
i went from a dlink 504 to a linksys product and it worked perfect (and i actually prefer the linksys router)
just set a password for root
how did u fix it in the end?
good call. i tried that too, but i didnt think much of the dlink 504.
